name: CreateSurveyRequest
description:
Create a survey request and get a survey URL.

Use this tool to create a survey request for candidates and obtain a URL which can be shared with them to complete the survey. Note that this tool does not send the survey URL to the candidate automatically; it just generates the link.

parameters.name: survey_request_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing `candidateId`, `applicationId`, and `surveyFormDefinitionId` to specify the candidate, their application, and survey form.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
